title.rendered: STEDI 22MM – 30MM VICE BULL BAR TUBE CLAMPS

content.rendered:
22mm, 25mm, 28mm, 30mm Bull Bar Light Mounting Brackets Vice Tube Clamps ® Registered Design number: 201811269

OVERVIEW

The STEDI Vice Clamp Bull Bar Brackets will meet the versatile application when it comes to side mounted & certain lower mounted LED light Bars. Made from cast aluminium with stainless steel fasteners keeping it strong yet light weight as well as a polyester UV stable powder coat to reduce fade.

VERSATILE

Its ability to rotate on the bar and 360° rotation of your LED Light bar willopen up your method of mounting. Visually described in our product video you are able to face the clamps on any angle whilst still keeping the light facing forward.

WORK LIGHTS

When mounted on a vertical bar you will find the majority of our LED Work lights will also mount straight into the Vice Clamp as well. Compatible with LED Work Lights from as small as the 10w Mini up to as large as 60w Mining Spec.

DETAILS

STEDI’s all-new 22mm, 25mm, 28mm, 32mm Universal Light Bar Mounting Bracket prove that tough doesn’t need to be unsightly. Our brackets are guaranteed not to slip or fatigue no matter the environment. Unlike other generic clamps on the market, the aesthetical design of our light bar brackets facilitates a clean integrate install of your light bar work lights.

NOTE

These brackets suit only M6 bolts

KEY TECHNICAL DETAILS

  • Inserts supplied to fit 22mm, 25mm, 28mm, 32mm
  • Moulded from Cast Aluminium
  • Stainless Steel Fasteners included
  • Compatible with most side mounted LED Light Bars
  • Polyester UV Stable Powder Coated
  • 4mm set screw eliminates the possibility of slip.

Rubber inserts also included

In the event you do not have any vernier calipers, please measure the circumference (in mm) of your round bar and apply below formula; diameter (mm) = circumference (mm) divided by / 3.14 = (Tube Diameter)

Price is for 2 brackets.

Registered Design number: 201811269

SPECIFICATIONS

MATERIAL Aluminium
FITS TUBE DIAMETER 22mm, 25mm, 28mm, 30mm

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 2 x 22mm, 25mm, 28mm, 30mm  Vice Brackets
  • 4 x Rubber Inserts
  • 4 x Stainless 6mm Bolts
  • 2 x Allen Wrenches
  • 2 x 22mm insert
  • 2 x 25mm insert
  • 2 x 28mm insert

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI 22MM 25MM 28MM 30MM VICE BULL BAR TUBE CLAMPS ®

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
